Reviews.original: The artwork effectively uses contrasting colors to enhance visual interest. The red shirt with yellow sleeves on the character on the left stands out against the white background, and the orange pants add another layer of contrast. The green dress on the character on the right also contrasts well with the other colors used. The use of different colors for the Chinese characters further adds to the visual appeal. However, the contrast could be more pronounced in some areas to achieve a more striking visual impact.
